name: Mage Tower, A Tower Defense Card Game
name_original: Mage Tower, A Tower Defense Card Game
description:
Mage Tower, A Tower Defense Card Game is an adaptation of the 2013 card game, released the same year. Draft a deck of cards, then battle an AI opponent. Each time you defeat the enemy player, they gain more health. Learn the card pool and draft more degenerate decks as the enemy's power level increases.

Tower Defense-Inspired Battles

As you're battling the enemy, you'll both be fighting off hordes of monsters. Play your own monsters to attack the enemy, cast powerful spells to clear your monster board, and find other devious ways of attacking the opponent.

Adapted from the 2013 card game "Mage Tower, A Tower Defense Card Game"



As a 2013 game, keep in mind this has low resolution sprites and primitive retro sound effects. You fight the same AI opponent over and over, though both players will draft vastly different decks each time, and you'll be forced to adapt as the enemy gets more difficult.

Features:

•A faithful digital adaptation of the physical card game.
•Over 120 draftable cards.
•Two modes: "Random Deck" and "Draft Mode".
•Complex cards allowing for a deep well of card interactions.
•Each time you beat the opponent in a mode, the enemy gets more life next duel.
